settings.subheading: Explore the best natural ingredients around the world

settings.description: At Terra we are on a journey to create the highest quality products that leave smallest possible impact on our beautiful Earth.

settings.text: At TERRA we are on a journey to create some of the most sustainable innovative personal care products there are. We take the best ingredients that Mother Nature has to offer and combine them with cutting edge manufacturing technology, human innovation and out of the box thinking to create the highest quality, most comfortable and usable and sustainable personal care products.

Us kiwis (as the people of New Zealand are often called), are justifiably proud of our unique and stunning landscape. Guardianship, protection or Kaitiakitanga as it is called by indigenous Maori people is part of the fabric of New Zealand society and also is at the core of what we do at TERRA.

Our origins and the majority of our on-going and future operations are firmly placed in New Zealand, a rich and diverse land in the South Pacific. New Zealand is renowned globally for innovation and ingenuity, whether that is creating the world’s first disposable syringe to building a jet boat that can travel in only centimetres of water.

settings.title: SENIOR MANAGEMENT TEAM
settings.text: Us kiwis (as the people of New Zealand are often called), are justifiably proud of our unique and stunning landscape. Guardianship, protection or Kaitiakitanga as it is called by indigenous Maori people is part of the fabric of New Zealand society and also is at the core of what we do at Terra.

settings.heading: BEN L.
settings.text: “We do what we can to make sure we will continue to enjoy the best of what nature can provide. ”

settings.heading: BEN L.
settings.text: “We are committed to providing packaging that reduces impact on the environment, whilst at the same time having packaging that is easy and convenient for you. . ”

settings.heading: BEN L.
settings.text: “love you to be part of our journey. ”

settings.heading: BEN L.
settings.text: “Let’s keep the environment always at the heart of everything we do.. ”

settings.heading: BEN L.
settings.text: “We always do our best for you. ”

settings.title: LESS ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT
settings.text: Our goal is always to tread as lightly as possible leaving as little environmental impact as we can so that future generations can enjoy the same gifts that nature has provided to us that we have. At our manufacturing facilities we strive to use renewable energy and we recycle or donate any waste created during the process.

settings.heading: LESS ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT
settings.text: Our goal is always to tread as lightly as possible leaving as little environmental impact as we can so that future generations can enjoy the same gifts that nature has provided to us that we have. At our manufacturing facilities we strive to use renewable energy and we recycle or donate any waste created during the process.

settings.title: EXPLORE THE BEST NATURAL INGREDIENTS AROUND THE WORLD
settings.text: The team at TERRA has travelled the world in search of the best natural ingredients, from the Bamboo forests of Asia, the highest quality wood chip from the lush forests of the United States, sugar cane from the dry rich soil of Northern Australia, soybean amino acid from the coastal fishing communities of Japan, right through to kiwifruit grown literally down the road from our head office.

settings.title: CIRCULAR ECONOMY DIAGRAM
settings.text: By combining the best that Mother Nature has to offer, cutting edge technology and a big dose of famous kiwi ingenuity and innovation we do our utmost to create a circular economy for our products and operations, taking only what we need, and giving back much as we can.

settings.heading: CIRCULAR ECONOMY DIAGRAM
settings.text: By combining the best that Mother Nature has to offer, cutting edge technology and a big dose of famous kiwi ingenuity and innovation we do our utmost to create a circular economy for our products and operations, taking only what we need, and giving back much as we can.

settings.title: TO THOSE IN NEED
settings.text: In all of the markets Terra operates in we strive to give back to those in need at a grass roots level, donating products to local community groups and charities whether that is providing personal care products to families in most marginalized communities in New Zealand through to providing nappies free of charge to mothers in the impoverished areas of Mumbai.
